name: Suspicious Rundll32 Script in CommandLine
description: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on arguments
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*rundll32* AND process.command_line:*mshtml,RunHTMLApplication* AND process.command_line:(*javascript\:* OR *vbscript\:*))`
